data.title: Start Round Sands Dart A Split From Barrier Spawn
data.description: Use this dart at the start of the round to contest, or split through Sands to the A Site. This dart will not scan any Defenders tucked inside Rafters.

data.title: Start Round Dish Dart From Barrier Spawn
data.description: At the start of the round, use this dart for easy information at Dish. This will scan any Defender playing there at the beginning of the round.

data.title: Default Info Dart for A Main from Barrier Spawn
data.description: Use this dart at the start of the round for easy A Main info. However, Defenders can hide behind the box in main.

data.title: B Tree To Back B Site Recon Bolt
data.description: This quick and easy Recon Bolt lands above the boxes in the B Site Spike plant zone, and scans many of the commonly held angles on B Site.
